item.description:
September Entrepreneurs Forum: The future of web advertising

Spetember 23, 2010 - 6:30PM at WorkBar Boston

Register for ULS Boston - The future of web advertising in Boston, MA on Eventbrite

This panel will help you understand where web advertising is heading. Not just what's working now, but what are the important trends and how these trends are changing the game.

* Does web advertising still work?
* Has media convergence fundamentally changed the way advertising works?
* SMBs, Deals & Pay-For-Performance advertising: What's next for Groupon, LivingSocial, and the deal space?
* FaceBook: How do you use 1 billion eyeballs and tons of private data to make money?
* The Old Spice Man: Lessons learned.
* Like a hypodermic needle: will ad targeting really deliver?
* Friends, followers, and social currency: How to successfully seed the social virus.
* Since you can't control the conversation, how do you get people to talk about your products and brand?

Moderator:

* TBD,

Panelists (alphabetic order):

* Eran Lobel, CEO/Producer Element Productions
* Mok Oh, found / CTO EveryScape.com
* Brad Rosen, CEO Drync LLC
item.name: ULS Boston Forum - The Future of Web Advertising
